verses.verse: ה֖וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> city דָּמִ֑ים <S%H1818><s%> to the bloody כֻּלָּ֗הּ <S%H3605><s%> completely כַּ֤חַשׁ <S%H3585><s%> of lies פֶּ֙רֶק֙ <S%H6563><s%> [and] robbery מְלֵאָ֔ה <S%H4395><s%> fruit לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> never יָמִ֖ישׁ <S%H4185><s%> departeth טָֽרֶף׃ <S%H2964><s%> the prey

ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> The noise שׁ֔וֹט <S%H7752><s%> of a whip וְק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the noise רַ֣עַשׁ <S%H7494><s%> of the rattling אוֹפָ֑ן <S%H212><s%> of the wheels וְס֣וּס <S%H5483><s%> horses דֹּהֵ֔ר <S%H1725><s%> and of the pransing וּמֶרְכָּבָ֖ה <S%H4818><s%> chariots מְרַקֵּדָֽה׃ <S%H7540><s%> and of the jumping

פָּרָ֣שׁ <S%H6571><s%> The horseman מַעֲלֶ֗ה <S%H5927><s%> lifteth up וְלַ֤הַב <S%H3851><s%> both the bright חֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> sword וּבְרַ֣ק <S%H1300><s%> and the glittering חֲנִ֔ית <S%H2595><s%> spear וְרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> and [there is] a multitude חָלָ֖ל <S%H2491><s%> of slain וְכֹ֣בֶד <S%H3514><s%> and a great פָּ֑גֶר <S%H6297><s%> number of carcases וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> none קֵ֙צֶה֙ <S%H7097><s%> and [there is] none end לַגְּוִיָּ֔ה <S%H1472><s%> of [their] corpses [יִכְשְׁלוּ כ] (וְכָשְׁל֖וּ <S%H3782><s%> bereave ק) בִּגְוִיָּתָֽם׃ <S%H1472><s%> upon their corpses

מֵרֹב֙ <S%H7230><s%> Because of the multitude זְנוּנֵ֣י <S%H2181><s%> harlot זוֹנָ֔ה <S%H2181><s%> of the harlot ט֥וֹבַת <S%H2896><s%> one חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> favour בַּעֲלַ֣ת <S%H1172><s%> the mistress כְּשָׁפִ֑ים <S%H3785><s%> of witchcrafts הַמֹּכֶ֤רֶת <S%H4376><s%> that selleth גּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> nations בִּזְנוּנֶ֔יהָ <S%H2183><s%> of the whoredoms וּמִשְׁפָּח֖וֹת <S%H4940><s%> and families בִּכְשָׁפֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H3785><s%> through her witchcrafts

הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> behold אֵלַ֗יִךְ <S%H413><s%> I am against נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> Behold I [am] against thee saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts וְגִלֵּיתִ֥י <S%H1540><s%> and I will discover שׁוּלַ֖יִךְ <S%H7757><s%> thy skirts עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פָּנָ֑יִךְ <S%H6440><s%> upon thy face וְהַרְאֵיתִ֤י <S%H7200><s%> and I will shew גוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> the nations מַעְרֵ֔ךְ <S%H4626><s%> thy nakedness וּמַמְלָכ֖וֹת <S%H4467><s%> and the kingdoms קְלוֹנֵֽךְ׃ <S%H7036><s%> thy shame

וְהִשְׁלַכְתִּ֥י <S%H7993><s%> And I will cast עָלַ֛יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and שִׁקֻּצִ֖ים <S%H8251><s%> abominable filth וְנִבַּלְתִּ֑יךְ <S%H5034><s%> upon thee and make thee vile וְשַׂמְתִּ֖יךְ <S%H7760><s%> and will set כְּרֹֽאִי׃ <S%H7210><s%> thee as a gazingstock

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> will come כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all רֹאַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H7200><s%> And it shall come to pass [that] all they that look יִדּ֣וֹד <S%H5074><s%> upon thee shall flee מִמֵּ֔ךְ <S%H4480><s%> at וְאָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> from thee and say שָׁדְּדָ֣ה <S%H7703><s%> is laid waste נִֽינְוֵ֔ה <S%H5210><s%> Nineveh מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> Who יָנ֣וּד <S%H5110><s%> who will bemoan לָ֑הּ מֵאַ֛יִן <S%H370><s%> her? whence אֲבַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> shall I seek מְנַחֲמִ֖ים <S%H5162><s%> comforters לָֽךְ׃

הֲתֵֽיטְבִי֙ <S%H3190><s%> Art thou better מִנֹּ֣א <S%H4996><s%> No אָמ֔וֹן <S%H528><s%> multitude הַיֹּֽשְׁבָה֙ <S%H3427><s%> that was situate בַּיְאֹרִ֔ים <S%H2975><s%> among the rivers מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> [that had] the waters סָבִ֣יב <S%H5439><s%> round about לָ֑הּ אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> her Whose חֵ֣יל <S%H2426><s%> it whose rampart יָ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> [was] the sea מִיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> the sea חוֹמָתָֽהּ׃ <S%H2346><s%> [and] her wall

כּ֥וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> Ethiopia עָצְמָ֛ה <S%H6109><s%> [were] her strength וּמִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> and Egypt וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> without קֵ֑צֶה <S%H7097><s%> limits פּ֣וּט <S%H6316><s%> Put וְלוּבִ֔ים <S%H3864><s%> and Lubim הָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> were among בְּעֶזְרָתֵֽךְ׃ <S%H5833><s%> were thy helpers

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Yet הִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> he לַגֹּלָה֙ <S%H1473><s%> Yet [was] she carried away הָלְכָ֣ה <S%H1980><s%> she went בַשֶּׁ֔בִי <S%H7628><s%> into captivity גַּ֧ם <S%H1571><s%> Also עֹלָלֶ֛יהָ <S%H5768><s%> her young children יְרֻטְּשׁ֖וּ <S%H7376><s%> also were dashed in pieces בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> at the top כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every חוּצ֑וֹת <S%H2351><s%> of all the streets וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for נִכְבַּדֶּ֙יהָ֙ <S%H3513><s%> for her honourable men יַדּ֣וּ <S%H3032><s%> and they cast גוֹרָ֔ל <S%H1486><s%> lots וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all גְּדוֹלֶ֖יהָ <S%H1419><s%> and all her great men רֻתְּק֥וּ <S%H7576><s%> were bound בַזִּקִּֽים׃ <S%H2131><s%> in chains

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> too אַ֣תְּ <S%H859><s%> you תִּשְׁכְּרִ֔י <S%H7937><s%> Thou also shalt be drunken תְּהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> become נַֽעֲלָמָ֑ה <S%H5956><s%> thou shalt be hid גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> too אַ֛תְּ <S%H859><s%> you תְּבַקְשִׁ֥י <S%H1245><s%> thou also shalt seek מָע֖וֹז <S%H4581><s%> strength מֵאוֹיֵֽב׃ <S%H341><s%> because of the enemy

כָּ֨ל־ <S%H3605><s%> All מִבְצָרַ֔יִךְ <S%H4013><s%> All thy strong holds תְּאֵנִ֖ים <S%H8384><s%> [shall be like] fig trees עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with בִּכּוּרִ֑ים <S%H1061><s%> with the firstripe figs אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo יִנּ֕וֹעוּ <S%H5128><s%> if they be shaken וְנָפְל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> they shall even fall עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> into the mouth אוֹכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> of the eater

הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עַמֵּ֤ךְ <S%H5971><s%> Behold thy people נָשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> of thee [are] women בְּקִרְבֵּ֔ךְ <S%H7130><s%> in the midst לְאֹ֣יְבַ֔יִךְ <S%H341><s%> unto thine enemies פָּת֥וֹחַ <S%H6605><s%> shall be set wide נִפְתְּח֖וּ <S%H6605><s%> open שַׁעֲרֵ֣י <S%H8179><s%> the gates אַרְצֵ֑ךְ <S%H776><s%> of thy land אָכְלָ֥ה <S%H398><s%> shall devour אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> the fire בְּרִיחָֽיִך׃ <S%H1280><s%> thy bars

מֵ֤י <S%H4325><s%> thee waters מָצוֹר֙ <S%H4692><s%> for the siege שַֽׁאֲבִי־ <S%H7579><s%> Draw לָ֔ךְ חַזְּקִ֖י <S%H2388><s%> fortify מִבְצָרָ֑יִךְ <S%H4013><s%> thy strong holds בֹּ֧אִי <S%H935><s%> go בַטִּ֛יט <S%H2916><s%> into clay וְרִמְסִ֥י <S%H7429><s%> and tread בַחֹ֖מֶר <S%H2563><s%> the morter הַחֲזִ֥יקִי <S%H2388><s%> make strong מַלְבֵּֽן׃ <S%H4404><s%> the brickkiln

שָׁ֚ם <S%H8033><s%> There תֹּאכְלֵ֣ךְ <S%H398><s%> devour אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> There shall the fire תַּכְרִיתֵ֣ךְ <S%H3772><s%> shall cut thee off חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> thee the sword תֹּאכְלֵ֖ךְ <S%H398><s%> it shall eat thee up כַּיָּ֑לֶק <S%H3218><s%> like the cankerworm הִתְכַּבֵּ֣ד <S%H3513><s%> make thyself many כַּיֶּ֔לֶק <S%H3218><s%> as the cankerworm הִֽתְכַּבְּדִ֖י <S%H3513><s%> make thyself many כָּאַרְבֶּֽה׃ <S%H697><s%> as the locusts

הִרְבֵּית֙ <S%H7235><s%> Thou hast multiplied רֹֽכְלַ֔יִךְ <S%H7402><s%> thy merchants מִכּוֹכְבֵ֖י <S%H3556><s%> above the stars הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven יֶ֥לֶק <S%H3218><s%> the cankerworm פָּשַׁ֖ט <S%H6584><s%> spoileth וַיָּעֹֽף׃ <S%H5774><s%> and flieth away

מִנְּזָרַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H4502><s%> Thy crowned כָּֽאַרְבֶּ֔ה <S%H697><s%> [are] as the locusts וְטַפְסְרַ֖יִךְ <S%H2951><s%> and thy captains כְּג֣וֹב <S%H1462><s%> as the great grasshoppers גֹּבָ֑י <S%H1462><s%> of grasshoppers הַֽחוֹנִ֤ים <S%H2583><s%> which camp בַּגְּדֵרוֹת֙ <S%H1448><s%> in the hedges בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day קָרָ֔ה <S%H7135><s%> in the cold שֶׁ֤מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> [but] when the sun זָֽרְחָה֙ <S%H2224><s%> ariseth וְנוֹדַ֔ד <S%H5074><s%> they flee away וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נוֹדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> is not known מְקוֹמ֖וֹ <S%H4725><s%> and their place אַיָּֽם׃ <S%H335><s%> where

נָמ֤וּ <S%H5123><s%> slumber רֹעֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H7462><s%> Thy shepherds מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> O king אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria יִשְׁכְּנ֖וּ <S%H7931><s%> shall dwell אַדִּירֶ֑יךָ <S%H117><s%> thy nobles נָפֹ֧שׁוּ <S%H6335><s%> is scattered עַמְּךָ֛ <S%H5971><s%> [in the dust] thy people עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הֶהָרִ֖ים <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there מְקַבֵּֽץ׃ <S%H6908><s%> and no man gathereth

אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> There כֵּהָ֣ה <S%H3545><s%> [There is] no healing לְשִׁבְרֶ֔ךָ <S%H7667><s%> of thy bruise נַחְלָ֖ה <S%H2470><s%> is grievous מַכָּתֶ֑ךָ <S%H4347><s%> thy wound כֹּ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> All שֹׁמְעֵ֣י <S%H8085><s%> all that hear שִׁמְעֲךָ֗ <S%H8088><s%> the bruit תָּ֤קְעוּ <S%H8628><s%> of thee shall clap כַף֙ <S%H3709><s%> the hands עָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> over כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over מִ֛י <S%H4310><s%> whom לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not עָבְרָ֥ה <S%H5674><s%> passed רָעָתְךָ֖ <S%H7451><s%> over thee for upon whom hath not thy wickedness תָּמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> alway
